column4: hi, im using the ubuntu netbook version and im trying to get my main menu to the default ubuntu style and not with those big symbols on the left side. can anyone help me? =/
that is essential compontent in the netbook-interface. You should best re√Ønstall with normal Gnome. You cannot have both Gnome and Netbook Remix.

though maybe you can find Unity (the name of the interface you have) plugins, apps or tweaks, that make it a little bit like gnome. Though I am quite certain, just switching to Gnome is by far the easiest for you :)
